=======
EEA PDF
=======
Extend collective.sendaspdf functionality

.. contents::


Installation
============

  * Go to admin > Site Setup > Add-ons
  * Activate eea.pdf

Getting started
===============

  * Go to admin > Site Setup > PDF Settings

Authors
=======

  EEA_ - European Environment Agency (EU)

.. _EEA: http://www.eea.europa.eu/
